alert.note: Alert for Floyd; Knott; Letcher; Pike (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 14 at 9:17PM EDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Letcher, east central Knott, southeastern Floyd and southwestern Pike Counties through 945 PM EDT... At 917 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Ligon, or 11 miles southwest of Pikeville, moving southeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Virgie around 920 PM EDT. Dorton, Myra, Jonancy, Beefhide and McRoberts around 925 PM EDT. Adamson, Lookout and Rockhouse around 930 PM EDT. Shelby Gap and Ashcamp around 935 PM EDT. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
